amendment.description: To further enhance the denial of deduction for certain fines, penalties, and other amounts.

action.text: Amendment SA 575 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 575 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 61. Record Vote Number: 161.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 575.
Amendment SA 575 proposed by Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S6222-6226) To further enhance the denial of deduction for certain fines, penalties, and other amounts.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 575 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 61. Record Vote Number: 161.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 575 proposed by Senator Kyl.
